ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: In memory of Luis Beltran Rojas Fermin (1963–2020), Director of the Research Institute, Faculty of Pharmacy and Bioanalysis, University of Los Andes, Mérida, Venezuela, for his outstanding career in Natural Products research where he achieved more than 160 published papers in Phytochemistry, Essential oil characterization, and diverse biological activity assays. On behalf of his colleagues and friends, we would like to express our gratitude for all the knowledge and valuable shared moments.
